name: BoogieBomb

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a boogie bomb
des:
Catch the entire room off guard!
ALEXA: Launch A Boogie Bomb!

Feel like dancing? Launch a Boogie Bomb! Just ask Alexa to Launch A Boogie Bomb! The Boogie Bomb skill will toss a Fortnite Boogie Bomb in real life! Disco Disco!

You dont have to play Fortnite to mix things up with a Boogie Bomb! Launch a Boogie Bomb now! 

We declare no affiliation, sponsorship, partnerships, endorsements, or in any way affiliated with Fortnite. Any product names, logos, brands, and other trademarks or images featured or referred to within are the property of their respective trademark holders.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
